Coverify



Common Problems


If album or artist covers are not displaying in the image, please redownload the image or click the Coverify logo. If you just refresh the browser, you will have the same session and it still may not work as expected.

If your magazine is not looking as expected (any values are saying 'Undefined' or look null), please click the Coverify logo to refresh the page.

If you have data from an artist name or song title that is very long or has unexpected charaters, the magazine may not look as designed.

If there are a high volume of requests, Spotify can drop the API requests any at a given time and there is no way to prevent that. Please click the Coverify logo to refresh the page or revisit again later.
